## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [ANCHOR\_RADIUS](./blockly.bubble.anchor_radius.md) | <code>static</code> | number | Distance between arrow point and anchor point. |
|  [ARROW\_ANGLE](./blockly.bubble.arrow_angle.md) | <code>static</code> | number | The number of degrees that the arrow bends counter-clockwise. |
|  [ARROW\_BEND](./blockly.bubble.arrow_bend.md) | <code>static</code> | number | The sharpness of the arrow's bend. Higher numbers result in smoother arrows. |
|  [ARROW\_THICKNESS](./blockly.bubble.arrow_thickness.md) | <code>static</code> | number | Determines the thickness of the base of the arrow in relation to the size of the bubble. Higher numbers result in thinner arrows. |
|  [BORDER\_WIDTH](./blockly.bubble.border_width.md) | <code>static</code> | number | Width of the border around the bubble. |
|  [content\_](./blockly.bubble.content_.md) |  | SVGElement |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.bubble.dispose.md) |  | Dispose of this bubble. |
|  [getBubbleSize()](./blockly.bubble.getbubblesize.md) |  | Get the dimensions of this bubble.  The height and width of the bubble. |
|  [getRelativeToSurfaceXY()](./blockly.bubble.getrelativetosurfacexy.md) |  | Return the coordinates of the top-left corner of this bubble's body relative to the drawing surface's origin (0,0), in workspace units.  Object with .x and .y properties. |
|  [getSvgRoot()](./blockly.bubble.getsvgroot.md) |  | Return the root node of the bubble's SVG group.  The root SVG node of the bubble's group. |
|  [registerMoveEvent(callback)](./blockly.bubble.registermoveevent.md) |  | Register a function as a callback event for when the bubble is moved. |
|  [registerResizeEvent(callback)](./blockly.bubble.registerresizeevent.md) |  | Register a function as a callback event for when the bubble is resized. |
|  [setAnchorLocation(xy)](./blockly.bubble.setanchorlocation.md) |  | Notification that the anchor has moved. Update the arrow and bubble accordingly. |
|  [setBubbleSize(width, height)](./blockly.bubble.setbubblesize.md) |  | Size this bubble. |
|  [setColour(hexColour)](./blockly.bubble.setcolour.md) |  | Change the colour of a bubble. |
|  [setDeleteStyle(\_enable)](./blockly.bubble.setdeletestyle.md) |  | Update the style of this bubble when it is dragged over a delete area. |
|  [setSvgId(id)](./blockly.bubble.setsvgid.md) |  | Expose the block's ID on the bubble's top-level SVG group. |
